Title: 05 - Techniques for Improving User Interaction
Tip: Queue user interaction events while the canvas is rendering.

Summary.What: Advoid processing events that may cause the render to change during the render process
Summary.Why: Doing 'work' on the UI thread will cause the canvas to feel slugish.
Summary.How: Set a busy flags while UI is rendering, queue any events to processing when the render is complete.
